Module com.example.umleditor
Package com.example.umleditor.ui

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.example.umleditor.ui.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
MainController class manages the interactions and operations within the UML editor.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainController

      public MainController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded.

    • deleteClassDiagramComponents

      public void deleteClassDiagramComponents()
      Deletes the selected class components from the class diagram. Removes the class components and their associated connections, then redraws the components.

    • generateCode

      public void generateCode()
      Generates code for the class diagram. Uses the CodeGenerator class to generate code based on the class components.

    • saveDiagram

      public void saveDiagram()
      Saves the current diagram (either class or use case) to a file. Prompts the user to select a location to save the file and handles serialization.

    • loadDiagram

      public void loadDiagram()
      Loads a diagram (either class or use case) from a file. Prompts the user to select a file to load and handles deserialization.

    • addClassDiagramConnection

      public void addClassDiagramConnection()
      Adds a class diagram connection between two selected class components. Prompts the user to select an arrow type and multiplicity for the connection.

    • removeClassDiagramConnection

      public void removeClassDiagramConnection()
      Removes a class diagram connection between two selected class components. Prompts the user to confirm the deletion before removing the connection.
